Augment.Name: No Augment
Augment.Description: Clear the selected augment from this slot

Augment.Name: Deconstructor
Augment.Description: Weapon gains DR bypass "Adamantine" and 6d6 Rust damage versus constructs. Destruction: On Hit: Your target gains a stack of Armor Destruction. (-1 penalty to Armor Class, -1% of its Fortification. 20 second duration. Stacks up to 15 times.) This effect may trigger once every three seconds.

Augment.Name: Globe of True Imperial Blood
Augment.Description: +1 Exceptional bonus to all abilities

Augment.Name: Golem's Heart
Augment.Description: 2% chance on your being hit to heal you for 20 to 120 Hit Points and deal 50 to 300 Electric damage to your surrounding enemies.

Augment.Name: Meridian Fragment
Augment.Description: -6 SP Cost to Maximized spells. Once every three seconds when you take physical damage you get Psionic Potency +8. This can stack up to three times (up to Psionic Potency +24) and each stack lasts for 20 seconds.

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Snowpeaks
Augment.Description: Adds freezing ice and Cold damage 1 to 8 Cold Damage. Occasionally lock targets in frozen ice.

Augment.Description: Adds Cold Iron damage reduction bypass to your equipped weapons

Augment.Name: Ruby of Ghostbane
Augment.Description: Ghost Touch 1 to 6 Bane damage on hit vs Undead

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Crushing Wave
Augment.Description: Adds crushing wave to your weapon attacks

Augment.Description: Your weapon now inflicts a Negative Level on a vorpal hit

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Vampire Slayer
Augment.Description: Your weapon gains DR Silver and does 1 to 4 Light damage

Augment.Name: Scourge of the Outsiders
Augment.Description: Deals +4 to 24 Bane damage to Outsiders on hit. On Vorpal Hit: If an outsider struck by this weapon has fewer than 1000 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the outsider has above 1000 hit points, it takes 100 damage. Drops in U48 Quest: The Thornwright

Augment.Name: Ruby Eye of Erosion
Augment.Description: 2% Chance On-Hit to cause a blast of acid that deals 3 to 18 points of acid damage per Minimum Level of the upgraded weapon to all nearby enemies.

Augment.Name: Ruby Eye of the Inferno
Augment.Description: 2% Chance On-Hit to cause a blast of flame that deals 4 to 16 points of fire damage per minimum level of the upgraded weapon to all nearby enemies.

Augment.Name: Ruby Eye of the Glacier
Augment.Description: 2% Chance On-Hit to cause a blast of cold that deals 7 to 14 points of cold damage per minimum level of the upgraded weapon to all nearby enemies.

Augment.Name: Ruby Eye of the Tempest
Augment.Description: 2% Chance On-Hit to cause a bolt of lightning that deals 1 to 20 points of electrical damage per minimum level of the upgraded weapon to all nearby enemies.

Augment.Name: Ruby Eye of Righteousness
Augment.Description: 2% Chance On-Hit to cause a blast of holy energy that deals 3 to 12 points of holy damage per minimum level of the upgraded weapon to all nearby enemies.

Augment.Name: Ruby Eye of Force
Augment.Description: 2% Chance On-Hit to cause a burst of magical force that deals 3 to 12 points of force damage per minimum level of the upgraded weapon to all nearby enemies.

Augment.Name: Meteoric Star Ruby
Augment.Description: 2% chance On Hit to cause a falling star to strike your target, dealing 3 to 18 Fire Damage and 1 to 6 Bludgeoning Damage per Minimum Level of the weapon to all nearby enemies, with a chance to knock them prone.

Augment.Name: Acid Storm
Augment.Description: Acid Storm: Black Dragon Breath (3 uses per rest): Like a black dragon, you can breathe a powerful stream of acid that deals 1d15 + 15 acid damage per caster level (Reflex save for half) to enemies within its area of effect. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. (Text says 5 times, charge bar says 3 / 3 Charges) caster level: 30

Augment.Name: Ice Storm
Augment.Description: Ice Storm: White Dragon Breath (3 uses per rest): Like a white dragon, you can breathe a powerful cone of intense cold that deals 1d15 + 15 cold damage per caster level (Reflex save for half) to enemies within its area of effect. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. (Text says 5 times, charge bar says 3 / 3 Charges) caster level: 30

Augment.Name: Fire Storm
Augment.Description: Fire Storm: Red Dragon Breath (3 uses per rest): Like a red dragon, you can breathe a powerful cone of intense flames that deals 1d15 + 15 fire damage per caster level (Reflex save for half) to enemies within its area of effect. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. (Text says 5 times, charge bar says 3 / 3 Charges) caster level: 30

Augment.Name: Lightning Storm
Augment.Description: Lightning Storm: Blue Dragon Breath (3 uses per rest): Like a blue dragon, you can breathe a powerful bolt of lightning that deals 1d15 + 15 electric damage per caster level (Reflex save for half) to enemies within its area of effect. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. (Text says 5 times, charge bar says 3 / 3 Charges) caster level: 30

Augment.Name: Legendary Air Strike
Augment.Description: Requires Air Air Air Attacks and spells have a chance [around ~1%] to deal massive electrical damage [around 2,000 (melee no buff)/around 10,000 (spell with spell amplifier), single target].

Augment.Name: Legendary Earth
Augment.Description: Requires Earth Earth Earth Attacks and offensive spells deal stacking Acid damage over time [100% chance to proc]. Half-second cooldown as of U29P1. [10-90 damage per stack, maximum 5 stacks, around 250 damage at full stacks]

Augment.Name: Legendary Incineration
Augment.Description: Requires Fire Fire Fire Attacks have a chance [around ~1%] to deal massive Fire damage [around 2,000 (melee no buff)/around 10,000 (spell with spell amplifier), single target].

Augment.Name: Legendary Water
Augment.Description: Requires Water Water Water Attacks and offensive spells have a chance [5~10%] to inflict ten stacks of cold damage over time [20~30 damage per stack, around 250 damage at full stack], adding one stack at a time. This effect has an internal cooldown. [cooldown unknown, duration 4 seconds per a stack]

Augment.Name: Legendary Affirmation
Augment.Description: Requires Positive Positive Positive Attacks and offensive spells have a [10~33%] chance to grant 1,000 temporary hitpoints with 1 minute duration. Cooldown is also one minute.

Augment.Name: Legendary Negation
Augment.Description: Requires Negative Negative Negative Attacks and offensive spells have a [100%, or later nerfed?] chance to deal 1d3 Negative levels (to a single target). This has a 30 second cooldown.

Augment.Name: Legendary Ice
Augment.Description: Requires Air and Water only Attacks and Offensive Spells have a [10~20%] chance to turn your target into a block of ice. (Fortitude? save, AoE, freezes target if it fails save and grants them DR 100/adamantine, does not add helpless condition)

Augment.Name: Legendary Lightning
Augment.Description: Requires Positive and Air only Attacks and offensive spells have a [5~10%] chance to create Lightning traps. ~160-360 damage, doesn't scale with spellpower. Additional 12d6 lightning damage on hit.

Augment.Name: Legendary Vacuum
Augment.Description: Requires Negative and Air Only Attacks and offensive spells have a [30%?] chance to inflict multiple [2-4] stacks of Vulnerable. Originally had 100%, 6-7 stacks but nerfed.

Augment.Name: Legendary Tempered
Augment.Description: Requires Air and Earth only Attacks and offensive spells have a moderate chance [10~20% for each] to deal extra acid and/or electric damage [80-120 damage, Spellpower not applied].

Augment.Name: Legendary Mineral
Augment.Description: Requires Earth and Positive only This weapon bypasses Adamantine, Byeshk, Cold Iron, Mithril, and Silver DR. This weapon is considerably strengthened, gaining +150 maximum Durability.

Augment.Name: Legendary Dust
Augment.Description: Requires Neagtive and Earth only Attacks and offensive spells have a 50% chance to reduce enemy PRR and Positive Healing Amplification. This penalty stacks. [-7 PRR and -20 healing amp per stack, maximum stack 5, hence -35 PRR and -100 healing amp at full stack. 11 seconds duration each stack]

Augment.Name: Legendary Smoke
Augment.Description: Requires Air and Fire only 27% Blurry, Enhancement bonus

Augment.Name: Legendary Magma
Augment.Description: Requires Earth anf Fire only Attacks and offensive spells deals fire damage over time on hit or spellcast, and slow enemy movement [100% chance to proc, 20-50 damage pear a stack, maximum 5 stacks, 3 ticks within 4 seconds duration for each stack, slow movement seems to be A quarter-second cooldown.

Augment.Name: Legendary Radiance
Augment.Description: Requires Positive and Fire only Attacks and offensive spells have a [10~20%] chance to blind enemies with [around 100] Light damage. (Scales with spellpower if triggered by a spell.) [no save, duration 11 seconds]

Augment.Name: Legendary Ash
Augment.Description: Requires Negative and Fire only Attacks and offensive spells have a 50% chance to reduce enemy MRR and Universal Spell Power. This penalty stacks. -7MRR and -20USP, MRR does not go negative, so it provides no additional magic damage on most enemies. 12 seconds duration.

Augment.Name: Legendary Ooze
Augment.Description: Requires Earth and Water only Attacks and offensive spells reduce enemy PRR and MRR [100% proc, minus 10 of each]. Attacks and offensive spells have a [~5%] chance to summon some kind of Legendary Ooze. [Summoned Ooze scales with quest level/difficulty, for example, CR52 one has around 5,000 HP and does about 250+1d8? Acid melee damage]

Augment.Name: Legendary Balance of Land and Sky
Augment.Description: Requires Fire and Water only Attacks and offensive spells have a moderate chance to deal extra acid and/or electric damage.

Augment.Name: Legendary Steam
Augment.Description: Requires Water and Positive only Attacks and offensive spells have a [15%] chance to deal untyped damage. [70-120, ~86 average]

Augment.Name: Legendary Salt
Augment.Description: Requires Water and Negative only Attacks and offensive spells have a [100%] chance to greatly reduce enemy movement speed and attack speed [about -90% slowdown]. This inflicts 8 stacks, which fade overtime. Has a short internal cooldown [1/4 seconds]. Doesn't affect bosses. [duration 11 seconds]

Augment.Name: Legendary Concordant Opposition
Augment.Description: Requires Positive and Negative only [1~2%] chance to gain HP and SP when hit [50-60 points, no cooldown?]. Offensive spells have a [~?%] chance to briefly grant 100 temporary spellpoints (This has a one minute cooldown).

Augment.Name: Improved Banishing
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Outsiders. On Vorpal Hit: If an outsider struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the outsider has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.

Augment.Name: Improved Vorpal
Augment.Description: Passive: +0.5[W] damage dice. On Vorpal Hit: If your target has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the target has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.

Augment.Name: Dazing VI
Augment.Description: On Hit: Your target suffers a -1 Penalty to Will Saving Throws for 6 seconds. This effect sacks up to 5 times. This effect may only occur on-hit once every three seconds. Passive: The DC of the saving throw to resist your Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist combat feats is increased by 11

Augment.Name: Deception VI
Augment.Description: 5% Chance on Hit: Your target becomes Bluffed for four seconds. On sneak Attack: +6 to Attack Rolls, +12 to Damage.

Augment.Name: Doublestrike 6%
Augment.Description: +6% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike chance.

Augment.Name: Ghostbane VI
Augment.Description: This weapon is attuned specifically to hurt ethereal monsters, dealing an additional 6d4 bane damage vs. Incorporeal monsters. Passive: This weapon has ghost touch and bypasses ethereal monster's 50% chance to evade bane damage.

Augment.Name: Heartseeker VI
Augment.Description: +6% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike chance.

Augment.Name: Improved Disruption
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Undead. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the undead has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.

Augment.Name: Improved Smiting
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Constructs. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the construct has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.

Augment.Name: Riposte VI
Augment.Description: When missed by an attack: Deals 6 to 24 damage to your attacker. Passive: +3 Insight bonus to AC and a +3 Insight bonus to saves.

Augment.Name: Stumbling VI
Augment.Description: On Hit: Your target suffers a -1 Penalty to Reflex Saving Throws for 6 seconds. This effect sacks up to 5 times. This effect may only occur on-hit once every three seconds. Passive: The DC of the saving throw to resist your Trip combat feats is increased by 11.

Augment.Name: Deception VIII
Augment.Description: 5% Chance on Hit: Your target becomes Bluffed for four seconds. On sneak Attack: +8 to Attack Rolls, +16 to Damage.

Augment.Name: Doublestrike 8%
Augment.Description: +8% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike chance.

Augment.Name: Ribcracker VIII
Augment.Description: On Critical Hit: 8d6 Bludgeoning damage from weapons with a x2 Critical Multiplier, 8d8 damage from weapons with a x3 Critical Multiplier, and 8d10 damage from weapons with a x4 or Greater Multiplier.

Augment.Name: Riposte VIII
Augment.Description: When missed by an attack: Deals 8 to 32 damage to your attacker. Passive: +4 Insight bonus to AC and a +4 Insight bonus to saves.

Augment.Name: Greater Smiting
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Constructs. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 2000 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the construct has above 2000 Hit Points, it takes 200 damage.

Augment.Description: The powerful poison coating this weapon deals 1 point of dexterity damage every time it strikes an enemy, and an additional 1d6 points when it scores a critical hit. Some creatures may be immune or resistant to ability damage.

Augment.Name: Strength Poison, Virulent
Augment.Description: The powerful poison coating this weapon deals 1 point of strength damage every time it strikes an enemy, and an additional 1d6 points when it scores a critical hit. Some creatures may be immune or resistant to ability damage.

Augment.Name: Amaunator's Blessing
Augment.Description: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.

Augment.Name: Woodsman's Guile
Augment.Description: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +4 bonus to your To-Hit and +6 bonus to your Damage on any attack that would be considered a Sneak Attack.

Augment.Name: Knight's Loyalty
Augment.Description: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +3 artifact bonus to your To-Hit and Damage rolls, and a +3 Insight bonus to Natural Armor.
Augment.Type: Embrace of the Spider Queen Armor Commendation Upgrade

Augment.Name: Way of the Sun Soul
Augment.Description: When all three item from the set are equipped and you are in a centered state, you will gain +2 artifact bonus to To-Hit and Damage rolls. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll that is confirmed as a critical hit, you will gain temporary benefit based on the elemental stance you are in, if any.

Augment.Name: Battle Arcanist
Augment.Description: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.

Augment.Name: Exceptional Combat Mastery +5
Augment.Description: Passive: +5 Insight Bonus to the DC of your Trips, Sunder, and Stunning Blow attacks.

Augment.Name: Shatter +10
Augment.Description: This effect gives a +10 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved sunder attempts.

Augment.Name: Stunning +10
Augment.Description: Gives +10 to the DC of any Stunning Blow attempts made with that weapon. This weapon also has a 3% chance on-hit to make DC 33 fortitude check to stun the monster.

Augment.Name: Vertigo +10
Augment.Description: This effect gives a +10 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip and Improved Trip attempts.

Augment.Name: Tendon Slice 10%
Augment.Description: This effect gives a 6% chance to Hamstring the target for each attack that does damage.

Augment.Name: Nulification +120
Augment.Description: Your Negative/Poison based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Devotion +120
Augment.Description: Your positive based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Radiance +120
Augment.Description: Your light and alignment based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Fiery Detonation
Augment.Description: This weapon is imbued with a fiery wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this burning power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 15d6 fire damage. A successful Fortitude save (DC 39) reduces this by half.

Augment.Name: Flaming Burst
Augment.Description: This weapon is sheathed in fire. The weapon deals an extra 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Radiance
Augment.Description: This weapon is imbued with a brilliant, radiant power that deals an additional 4 to 24 points of light damage and blinds the target on a successful critical hit.

Augment.Name: Disruption
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Undead. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 1000 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the undead has above 1000 Hit Points, it takes 100 damage.

Augment.Name: Holy Burst
Augment.Description: A holy weapon is imbued with holy power. This power makes the weapon good-aligned and thus bypasses the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against all of evil alignment and an extra 3 to 18 on a critical for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 4 to 24 for a x3 multiplier, and 5 to 30 for x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Greater Good
Augment.Description: This weapon is infused with the ultimate power of good. It does an additional 2 to 12 damage to non-good targets and can only be wielded by good aligned characters.

Augment.Name: Epic Fire 1st Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Maiming and Greater Fiery Detonation

Augment.Name: Epic Fire 2nd Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Flaming Blast, Purple Augment Slot and Epic Elemental Evil Set Bonus

Augment.Name: Epic Water 1st Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Maiming and Greater Freezing Gale

Augment.Name: Epic Water 2nd Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Icy Blast, Purple Augment Slot and Epic Elemental Evil Set Bonus

Augment.Name: Epic Earth 1st Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Maiming and Greater Acid Torrent

Augment.Name: Epic Earth 2nd Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Acid Blast, Purple Augment Slot and Epic Elemental Evil Set Bonus

Augment.Name: Epic Air 1st Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Maiming and Greater Electric Storm

Augment.Name: Epic Air 2nd Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Shocking Blast, Purple Augment Slot and Epic Elemental Evil Set Bonus

Augment.Name: +13 Strength
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Strength

Augment.Name: +13 Dexterity
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Dexterity

Augment.Name: +13 Constitution
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Constitution

Augment.Name: +13 Intelligence
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: +13 Wisdom
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Wisdom

Augment.Name: +13 Charisma
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Charisma

Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Strength

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Dexterity
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Dexterity

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Constitution
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Constitution

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Intelligence
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Wisdom
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Wisdom

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Charisma
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Charisma

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Strength
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Strength

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Dexterity
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Dexterity

Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Constitution

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Intelligence
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Wisdom
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Wisdom

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Charisma
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Charisma

Augment.Name: Completed Weapon
Augment.Description: This item is fully completed, and as a result deals an additional 0.5[W] damage.

Augment.Name: Purple Augment Slot (Sharn)
Augment.Description: Adds a Purple Augment slot to your weapon

Augment.Name: Armor-Piercing +1
Augment.Description: +1 Enhancement bonus to Bypass enemy fortification

Augment.Name: Fetters of Unreality
Augment.Description: This item is cruel and deadly, and leaves behind wounds that affect both the body and the soul. This weapon has a chance to inflict multiple stacks of Vulnerable. Vulnerable: You take 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.

Augment.Name: Conjure Radiant Bolt
Augment.Description: This weapon can summon its Radiant Bolt - The Everstar - at will once per day. The Everstar can explode on impact, dealing Light damage to your enemies in an area.

Augment.Name: Utter Disintegration
Augment.Description: This weapon has a dark, insidious power deep within. Occasionally, this power lashes out violently at enemies and attempts to disintegrate them. This disintegrate is incredibly powerful, and will utterly destroy weaker foes.

Augment.Name: Combustion/Fire Lore
Augment.Description: Fire Lore +5%: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Combustion +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Devotion/Healing Lore
Augment.Description: Healing Lore +5%: Passive: Your Healing spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Devotion +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Positive Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Nulification/Void Lore
Augment.Description: Void Lore +5%: Passive: Your Negative/Poison spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Nulification +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Negative/Poison Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Magnetism/Lightning Lore
Augment.Description: Lightning Lore +5%: Passive: Your Electric spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Magnetism +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Electric Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Impulse/Kinetic Lore
Augment.Description: Kinetic Lore +5%: Passive: Your Force, Physical, and Untyped spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Impulse +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Force, Physical, and Untyped Spells Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Corrosion/Acid Lore
Augment.Description: Acid Lore +5%: Passive: Your Acid spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Corrosion +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Acid Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Resonance/Sonic Lore
Augment.Description: Sonic Lore +5%: Passive: Your Sonic spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Resonance +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Sonic Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Vorpal
Augment.Description: Passive: +0.5[W] damage dice. On Vorpal Hit: If your target has fewer than 3000 Hit Points, they are Instantly Slain. If your target has above 3000 Hit Points, they take 300 damage.

Augment.Name: Aligned
Augment.Description: This weapon transmutes into a form that is able to bypass any alignment based Damage Reduction. (Chaotic, Good, Evil, Lawful)

Augment.Name: Essence of the Cloak of Strahd
Augment.Description: Invisibility Guard: This item has a 10% chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit by foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and The Invisible Cloak of Strahd (The Curse of Strahd)

Augment.Name: Essence of Nullscale Armor
Augment.Description: Nullmagic Guard: On being hit with a spell: There is a small chance that you explode in arcane energies. Foes hit are subject to a silencing effect, preventing their spellcasts and dampening their magical protections for 10 seconds. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Nullscale Armor (Killing Time)

Augment.Name: Essence of the Epic Litany of the Dead
Augment.Description: Litany of the Dead II - Ability Bonus: The Litany of the Dead enhances the physical and mental abilities of its owner. Grants a +2 Profane bonus to all Abilities. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Epic Litany of the Dead (Mark of Death)

Augment.Name: Essence of Constellation, Broken and Reforged
Augment.Description: Improved Destruction: On Hit: Your target gains a stack of Armor Destruction. -1 penalty to Armor Class, -1% of its Fortification. 20 second duration. Stacks up to 15 times. This effect may trigger once every second. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and The Broken Blade of Constellation and Shattered Hilt of Constellation or Constellation, Cursed Blade (Too Hot to Handle)

Augment.Name: Essence of The Masque
Augment.Description: Soundproof: Protects against stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound-based spells such as Soundburst and Greater Shout. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and The Masque (The Curse of Strahd)

Effect.Immunity: Stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound based spells

Augment.Name: Essence of the Cobalt Guard
Augment.Description: Improved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: applies Quell to target enemies for six seconds, rendering them unable to cast divine spells. 50% chance of preventing the from casting all spells for three seconds (12 second cooldown). Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Cobalt Guard (Riding the Storm Out)

Augment.Name: Essence of the Cracked Core
Augment.Description: Alchemical Conservation: This item modifies the user's energy expenditure in such a way that many abilities can be used more frequently than normal. You will gain +1 ki on every successful attack (Enhanced Ki). You will gain an additional use, per rest, of: Action boost, Turn Undead, and Bard song. These additional uses will only take effect after your rest. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Cracked Core (Project Nemesis)

Augment.Name: Essence of Dark Diversion
Augment.Description: Occultation: Decreases all threat generated by 20%. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Dark Diversion (Temple of the Deathwyrm)

Augment.Name: Essence of the Spear of the Mournlands
Augment.Description: Touch of the Mournlands: This item, once wielded by the Lord of Blades himself, taints each wound with the power of the Mournlands. Prolonged exposure will make the target more and more difficult to heal and repair, cutting their Healing and Repair Amplification, and also interferes with their ability to use magic by occasionally Quelling enemies on a Vorpal strike. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Spear of the Mournlands (Legendary Lord of Blades)

Augment.Name: Essence of the Champion of the Twins
Augment.Description: Healer's Bounty: This item has a small percentage chance to cast a heal spell on you when you take damage. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Champion of the Twins (Legendary Vision of Destruction)

Augment.Name: Essence of Ultimatum
Augment.Description: Petrification Immunity. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Ultimatum (Defiler of the Just)

Augment.Name: Essence of the Dethek Runestone
Augment.Description: Runic Revitalization: On Positive Energy Spell Cast: You have a 10% chance to gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and 50 Temporary Spell Points for 60 seconds. This effect can trigger once per 120 seconds. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Dethek Runestone (Fire on Thunder Peak)

Augment.Name: Perfect Silence
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +3 Artifact Bonus to Sneak Attack Dice. Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Vestments of Ravenloft (Old Baba's Hut)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Arcane Barrier
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +30 Magical Resistance Rating Cap Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Manle of Escher (The Curse of Strahd)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Paragon Guard
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +15% Artifact Bonus to Armor Class Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Platemail of Strahd (The Curse of Strahd)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Dusk Raider
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +15 Artifact Bonus to Melee and Ranged Power Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Coat of Van Richten (The Curse of Strahd)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Piercing Mind
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +3 Artifact bonus to Intelligence Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Staggershockers (Project Nemesis)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Touch of Power
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +25 Artifact bonus to Universal Spell Power Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Attunement's Gaze (Project Nemesis)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Alluring Elocution
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +3 Artifact Bonus to Charisma Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Tattered Scrolls of the Broken One (Too Hot to Handle)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Arcane Guardian
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +30 Artifact bonus to MRR Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Citadel's Gaze (Too Hot to Handle)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Visions of the Beyond
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +3 Artifact bonus to Wisdom Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Crystalline Gauntlets (Too Hot to Handle)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Cruel Cut
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +15% Artifact bonus to damage vs the Helpless Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and The Family's Blessing (Project Nemesis)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Truthful Blow
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +30% Artifact bonus to Fortification Bypass Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Helm of the Final Watcher (Project Nemesis)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Tough Shields
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +30 Artifact bonus to Physical Resistance Rating Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Dumathoin's Bracers (Temple of the Deathwyrm)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Esoterica
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +3 Artifact Bonus to all Spell DCs Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Cloak of the Mountain (Killing Time)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Quickblade
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +15% Artifact bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Guided Sight (Riding the Storm Out)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Brutal Blows
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +3 Artifact bonus to Strength Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Mail of the Mroranon (Killing Time)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Cunning Impact
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +3 Artifact bonus to Dexterity Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Strange Tidings (Defiler of the Just)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Wild Fortitude
Augment.Description: 3-Piece Set Bonus: +3 Artifact bonus to Constitution Requires: 50 Threads of Fate, Empty Soul Vessel and Quori-Infused Core (Legendary Lord of Blades)
Augment.EffectDescription: This augment will suppress any set bonus this item may have.

Augment.Name: Dismagicka
Augment.Description: Adds Shattermantle to weapon attacks. When a Shattermantle weapon strikes a foe that has spell resistance, the value of that spell resistance is reduced by 3 for 9 seconds. A fe can only have its SR reduced by one Shattermantle effect at a time.

Augment.Name: Emerald of Bitter Wounds
Augment.Description: Upgrades an item to provide a Boon of Undeath. Every time a character wearing a Boon of Undeath item is struck in combat, an Inflict Light Wounds spell will be cast on the character.

Augment.Name: Feareater
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to provide a Sovereign Nightmares. On Vorpal Hit: If your target has below 5,000 Hit Points, a burst of pure terror emanates from this weapon, snuffing out its life as if it were the subject of a Phantasmal Killer spell. If your target has above 5,000 Hit Points, they instead take significant Force damage.

Augment.Name: Intelligence +14
Augment.Description: Enhancement bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: Strength +13
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Strength

Augment.Name: Intelligence +13
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: Seeker +13
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to critical damage

Augment.Name: Deception 11
Augment.Description: +11 Enhancement bonus to hit and +17 Damage for Sneak Attacks.

Augment.Name: Deadly 11
Augment.Description: +11 Competence bonus to damage

Augment.Name: Speed +30%
Augment.Description: This item increases your speed giving you a +30% Enhancement bonus to Movement Speed and a +15% bonus to Attack Speed.

Augment.Name: Insightful Deadly +5
Augment.Description: +5 Insightful bonus to damage

Augment.Name: Insightful Accuracy +9
Augment.Description: +9 Insightful bonus to attack

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Magnetism
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Electric spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Lightning Lore +21%: Passive: Your Lightning gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Magnetism +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Electric Spell Power.
Insightful Magnetism +71: Passive: +71 Insight Bonus to Electric Spell Power.
Evocation Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Impulse
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Force spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Kinetic Lore +21%: +21% Equipment Bonus to Force, Physical and Untyped Spells chance to Critical Hit.
Impulse +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Force Spell Power.
Insightful Impulse +71: Passive: +71 Insight Bonus to Force Spell Power.
Evocation Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Glaciation
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Cold spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Ice Lore +21%: Passive: Your Cold gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Glaciation +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Cold Spell Power.
Insightful Glaciation +71: Passive: +71 insight Bonus to Cold Spell Power.
Evocation Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Corrosion
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Acid spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Acid Lore +21%: Passive: Your Acid gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Corrosion +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Acid Spell Power.
Insightful Corrosion +71: Passive: +71 insight Bonus to Acid Spell Power.
Conjuration Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Conjuration spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Combustion
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Fire spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Fire Lore +21%: Passive: Your Fire gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Combustion +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Fire Spell Power.
Insightful Combustion +71: Passive: +71 insight Bonus to Fire Spell Power.
Evocation Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Resonation
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Sonic spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Sonic Lore +21%: Passive: Your Sonic spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Resonance +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Sonic Spell Power.
Insightful Resonance +71: Passive: +71 Insightful Bonus to Sonic Spell Power.
Magical Sheltering +33: This item provides a +33 Enhancement bonus to your Magical Resistance Rating.

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Reconstruction
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Repair spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Repair Lore +21%: Passive: Your Repair and Rust spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Reconstruction +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Repair and Rust Spell Power.
Insightful Reconstruction +71: Passive: +71 Insightful Bonus to Repair and Rust Spell Power.
False Life +50: This item grants the wearer +50 enhancement bonus to maximum health.

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Radiance
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Light spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Radiance Lore +21%: +21% Equipment Bonus to Light and Alignment Spells chance to Critical Hit.
Radiance +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.
Insightful Radiance +71: Passive: +71 Insight Bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.

Insightful Wizardry +134: Passive: +134 insight Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes).

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Nulification
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Negative Energy and Poison spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Void Lore +21%: Passive: Your Negative/Poison energy spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Nulification +142: Passive: +142 Equipment bonus to Negative/Poison (Necrotic) Spell Power.
Insightful Nulification +71: Passive: +71 Insight bonus to Negative/Poison (Necrotic) Spell Power.
Necromancy Focus +5: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC of Necromancy spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Devotion
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Positive spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Healing Lore +21%: Passive: Your Healing spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Devotion +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Healing Spell Power.
Insightful Devotion +71: Passive: +71 Insightful Bonus to Healing Spell Power.
Physical Sheltering +33: This item provides a +33 Enhancement bonus to your Physical Resistance Rating.

Augment.Name: Adamantine
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks adamantine DR, Hardness increases by 10

Augment.Name: Mithral
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks mithral DR, Reduces the weight class of the item is appropriate

Augment.Name: Byeshk
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks Byeshk DR, +1 die step on handwraps

Augment.Name: Cold Iron
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks cold iron DR

Augment.Name: Crystal
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks Crystal DR, -10% ASF on shields

Augment.Name: Flametouched Iron
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks good DR

Augment.Name: Silver
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks Silver DR

Augment.Name: Fire I: Combustion
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Combustion 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Fire Spell Power.
Fire Lore +21%: Your Fire spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Fire I: Radiance
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Radiance 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.
Radiance Lore +21%: Your Light and Alignment spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Fire I: Devotion
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Combustion 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Fire Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Horn: Relentless Fury
Augment.Description: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enhancement damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Augment.Name: Horn: Sacred DCs
Augment.Description: +2 Sacred bonus to Spell DCs

Augment.Name: Horn: Enhanced Ghostly
Augment.Description: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Augment.Name: Horn: +286 Wizardry
Augment.Description: +286 Enhancement Bonus to Spell Points. If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes.

Augment.Name: Horn: Dimensional Horn
Augment.Description: +5% Enhancement bonus to Dodge Bypass.

Augment.Name: Horn: Fossilized Amber
Augment.Description: +250 Unconsciousness Range. You heal 20 HP every minute from Positive Energy.

Augment.Description: This weapon becomes Lawfully aligned, and on each hit, deals 10d6 extra Law damage to all non-Lawful enemies.

Augment.Description: This weapon becomes an Implement. +146 Equipment bonus to Positive and Force Spellpower.

Augment.Name: The Eye of Mabar
Augment.Description: This weapon becomes Evil aligned. You heal 5d2 damage per strike, and when you slay an enemy, you gain 15 Temporary HP. If you are Undead, this healing becomes Negative.

Augment.Description: You are immune to Fear. On a Critical Hit, this weapon applies the Shaken debuff.
